name: Mcfadden Warren
text: These are legitimate AirPods Pros and sound great!

name: Miranda Weiss
text: This AirPod was already registered to an apple account and it was visible that it had been used.

name: Ronda Travis
text: I'm thrilled. I love the fact there's multiple ear tips and the small ones fit my ears great.

name: Stone Holmes
text: I got it used and refused my return paid 370$ for nothing be aware.

name: Ethel Murray
text: Never owned AirPods before. I bought the AirPods 3 first. They sounded great, better than I thought they would

name: Rogers Gilmore
text: These are really nice earphones. I've had mine for about a year and have enjoyed them from the start.
